page.description: Deletes an object. If the object does not exist, no error will be returned.
page.example:
dim SubContainer as A5Storage::SubContainer = null_value() dim Item as A5Storage::DataItem = null_value()
CallResult = A5Storage::SubContainer::Open(SubContainer, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot';", "logs") ? CallResult.Success = .T.
? SubContainer.DeleteItem("MyTargetPath/MyObject") = .T.
